modulegroup.name: Time
modulegroup.description: Provides several modules to calculate date and time or to generate time slices.

modules.module: Specify the exact date and time.
Create a set of regular time slices by defining days, hours, and minutes of the interval.
Create a set of time slices by specifying a day-based interval (every x days).
Create a set of time slices by specifying the weekday in a month.
Create a set of time slices by specifying the hour of each day.
Specify time slices like in UNIX crontabs.
